attributes.title: Badge Counter Field
attributes.readMe:
A badge-style counter for displaying numeric counts with label (e.g., items in cart, tasks completed, notifications).

**Features:**
- Colored badge with label and value
- Supports integer counts (default: 0 decimals)
- Configurable range (default: 0-9999)
- Custom label text

**Display Style:**
- Compact inline badge (atom view)
- Larger badge with clear label/value separation (embedded view)
- Color: Primary blue background
- White text for contrast

**Use Cases:**
- Item counts ("ITEMS: 5")
- Task counters ("TASKS: 12")
- Inventory tracking
- Progress tracking
